mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_dtrm_base.select */ SELECT judg_no /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */ ,evnt_div_cd /* evnt_div_cd 이벤트_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,band_id /* band_id 밴드_ID character varying(40) */ ,occr_dttm /* occr_dttm 발생_일시 character(14) */ ,lat_val /* lat_val 위도_값 numeric */ ,lon_val /* lon_val 경도_값 numeric */ ,hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,min_hbit_cnt /* min_hbit_cnt 최소_심박_수 numeric */ ,max_hbit_cnt /* max_hbit_cnt 최대_심박_수 numeric */ ,hbit_mdan /* hbit_mdan 심박_중간값 numeric */ ,abnm_hbit_cnt /* abnm_hbit_cnt 이상_심박_수 numeric */ ,min1_hbit_cntn /* min1_hbit_cntn 1분_심박_내용 numeric */ ,temp_val /* temp_val 체온_값 numeric */ ,act_div_cd /* act_div_cd 활동_구분_코드 character varying(20) */ ,cbee_bal /* cbee_bal 캐시비_잔액 numeric */ ,accu_run_tcnt_cnt /* accu_run_tcnt_cnt 누적_달리기_시간_수 numeric */ ,accu_walk_tcnt_cnt /* accu_walk_tcnt_cnt 누적_걸음_시간_수 numeric */ ,accu_walk_cnt /* accu_walk_cnt 누적_걸음_수 numeric */ ,gram_no /* gram_no 전문_번호 numeric */ ,alam_no /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_dtrm_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND judg_no = #{judgNo} /* judg_no 판정_번호 numeric */
